attributes.action: Abolish road tax, as we already pay enough tax on fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, as British drivers, already pay far too much tax to use our vehicles.  I propose that the current road tax be abolished as we are already paying too much tax on fuel.
This system would also be fairer, as the ones who use the roads more, already pay more, as they use more fuel.
This would also stop us from being over-taxed, I believe we should have the freedom to choose the vehicle we drive without fear of  being charged more because of our choice.
Instead of a tax disk, Insurance and MOT should supply disks for display in the windscreen of our vehicles, this would also make it easier for policing of uninsured or unsafe vehicles.
